parameters: Well, I guess we don't have to worry about
the guards any more.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
Did...did we just unleash a zombie
apocolypse on this town?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
I can't help but think that my god is going
to be a little angry about this.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
A little?\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
So...we've killed everyone in Darkmoor now?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Assuming you don't count all the new
zombies wandering around, yes.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
I thought you ran off with that hussy,
but you were just making new friends.  Oh
\an[9], I'm so sorry I doubted you.
Forgive me?\af[8]\n<\an[8]>
Gru!\af[9]\n<\an[9]>
What's that \an[9], you want your new friend
to come with us?\af[8]\n<\an[8]>
You can't possibly be suggesting.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
\an[10] joined the party!
Dammit.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Now hold on, we never agreed to this.\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
No! Seriously! No way!\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
We don't have a choice, do we?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Nope! Teehee!\af[8]\n<\an[8]>
We'll have to figure out our battle
formation.  We can't all fight at
once.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
I nominate \an[3] to stay in the rear
while the grown ups handle the battles.
Hey!\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
Whatever, let's just get out of here
before the rest of the zombies come
after us.\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Before we go, we should see what's still
in the shops.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
You're not suggesting we start looting,
are you?\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Why not?  They can't use it any more.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
It's locked \af[1]\n<\an[1]>
He was trying to escape, but he looks
pretty singed.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Ouch! What in the devil?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
There's some sort of barrier there.\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
That dancing hussy from the inn is in the
middle of the barrier.  WE HAVE TO KILL
HER!\af[8]\n<\an[8]>
Let me take a look.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
This...this can't be.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
What?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Nothing.  We'll have to find a way to
disturb the barrier's power nexus.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Easy!  I'll throw a rock at it!\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
Heh heh heh.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
You knew that would happen, didn't you?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
You might think that.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Heal!\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Ok, so what do we need to do?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
We need to find the source of the barrier,
and some way to disrupt it.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
The magic shop probably has something
we can use to disrupt the barrier, but I have
no idea where the source is.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
If I were a barrier source, I'd be in a
cave!\af[8]\n<\an[8]>
That's...actually rather intelligent.
We should see if we can find a cave.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Well, let's go!\af[3]\n<\an[3]>
\an[1], a moment.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
This took more than an evening to set up,
didn't it?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Months.  We caused the zombie plague,
but there's more going on here.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Wonderful.  Any idea who's behind this?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Not yet, but I have a suspicion.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
Are you going to tell me?\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Fair enough.  Well, we'll keep our eyes
open and senses sharp.\af[1]\n<\an[1]>
Let's hope that's enough.\af[6]\n<\an[6]>
